title: CounterStrike 1.6 Decayed Lite - Repacked by Nyr
description:
The description says it all - this is Portable CounterStrike 1.6 Decayed Lite - a fixed, portable version of the game repacked by Nyr. I had nothing to do with the production of the package, obviously; I'm just uploading it for you to enjoy. It's a standalone package that doesn't require installation - just open the exe and it'll de-archive itself,and start up automatically.

Scanned with Avira Anti-Vir, no viruses/trojans/crap found. Of course, you'll probably want to check for yourself, but anything you find is not intentionally put there, honest!

Perfect for a LAN match on some underpowered work or school PCs :) Supposedly online play is possible too with some fiddling, although you'll need to look around for some help with that.

Please seed when you're finished.
